verses.verse: Being <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> had our <S%G4318>access<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> we <S%G2476>stand<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G235>so<s%>, but we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> our <S%G2347>tribulations<s%>: <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G5281>stedfastness<s%>;
and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5281>stedfastness<s%>, <S%G1382>approvedness<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1382>approvedness<s%>, <S%G1680>hope<s%>:

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G2617>putteth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G2617>shame<s%>; <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> hath been shed <S%G1632>abroad<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> which was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5607>while<s%> <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%>, in <S%G2596>due<s%> <S%G2540>season<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G765>ungodly<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3433>scarcely<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> a righteous <S%G1342>man<s%> <S%G599>will<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G599>die<s%>: <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5029>peradventure<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the good <S%G18>man<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> one <S%G5111>would<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5111>dare<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4921>commendeth<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> own <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, in <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G5607>while<s%> <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>.

Much <S%G4183><s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>, <S%G1344>being<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, shall we be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of God <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%>, while we <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%>, we were <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2288>death<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%>, being <S%G2644>reconciled<s%>, shall we be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G235>so<s%>, but <S%G2744>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2983>have<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G2643>reconciliation<s%>.

Therefore <S%G5124><s%>, <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G264>sinned<s%>: â€”

for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1677>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1677>imputed<s%> when there <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>.

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G76>Adam<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them that <S%G264>had<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1909>after<s%> the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> <S%G3847>of<s%> <S%G76>Adam<s%>'s <S%G3847>transgression<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G5179>figure<s%> of him that was to <S%G3195>come<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G3900>trespass<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is the free <S%G5486>gift<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> by the <S%G3900>trespass<s%> of the <S%G1520>one<s%> the <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G599>died<s%>, <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> did the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1431>gift<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4183>many<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> that <S%G264>sinned<s%>, so is the <S%G1434>gift<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> came <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> the free <S%G5486>gift<s%> came <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1345>justification<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%>, <S%G3900>by<s%> the <S%G3900>trespass<s%> of the <S%G1520>one<s%>, <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%>; <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall they that <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4050>abundance<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%>, even <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

So <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3900>trespass<s%> the judgment came <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation<s%>; <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> act of <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> the free gift came <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1347>justification<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>'s <S%G3876>disobedience<s%> the <S%G4183>many<s%> were <S%G2525>made<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, <S%G3779>even<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2525>shall<s%> the <S%G4183>many<s%> be <S%G2525>made<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3922>came<s%> in <S%G2443>besides<s%>, that the <S%G3900>trespass<s%> might <S%G4121>abound<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G4121>abounded<s%>, <S%G5485>grace<s%> did abound more <S%G5248>exceedingly<s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%>, <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G936>might<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
